application_type_full: Outline planning permission: Some matters reserved
description: Demolition of existing buildings; erection of a four storey building comprising of 8 three bedroom, 4 two bedroom, 9 one bedroom flats with provision of associated parking at lower basement level; erection of 5 four bedroom terrace houses linked to block A. erection of a single/ four storey building comprising of 4 three bedroom, 20 two bedroom, 18 one bedroom flats; use of ground floor as leisure community and learning resource centre (Classes D1 Non Residential Institutions and D2 Assembly and Leisure).
